Handlebars.template(function (Handlebars,depth0,helpers,partials,data) { this.compilerInfo = [4,'>= 1.0.0']; helpers = this.merge(helpers, Handlebars.helpers); data = data || {}; var buffer = "", stack1, helper, functionType="function", escapeExpression=this.escapeExpression; buffer += "Here comes the "; if (helper = helpers.thing) { stack1 = helper.call(depth0, {hash:{},data:data}); } else { helper = (depth0 && depth0.thing); stack1 = typeof helper === functionType ? helper.call(depth0, {hash:{},data:data}) : helper; } buffer += escapeExpression(stack1); return buffer; });
